component.name: EPGGridChannelCell
component.script:
function init() m.backgroundColor = m.top.findNode("backgroundColor") m.itemText = m.top.findNode("itemText") m.contentGroup = m.top.findNode("contentGroup") m.channelLogo = m.top.findNode("channelLogo") end function
function itemContentChanged() updateLayout() m.itemText.text = m.top.itemContent.title 'm.channelNumber.text = "" 'm.top.itemContent.channelNumber 'm.channelLogo.uri = m.top.itemContent.logo end function
function updateLayout() if m.top.itemContent <> invalid and m.top.width > 0 and m.top.height > 0 'm.backgroundColor.width=m.top.width '-24 'm.backgroundColor.height=m.top.height '- 12 m.itemText.width = m.top.width - 6 'm.itemText.height = m.top.height m.channelLogo.height = m.top.height - 36 m.channelLogo.width = int(m.top.height * 108 / 69) 'm.channelNumber.height = m.top.height 'm.channelNumber.width = int(m.top.width / 4) m.contentGroup.translation = [m.top.width / 2, 0] m.top.findNode("borderTop").width = m.top.width m.top.findNode("borderLeft").height = m.top.height m.top.findNode("borderBottom").width = m.top.width m.top.findNode("borderBottom").translation = [0, m.top.height - 1] m.top.findNode("borderRight").height = m.top.height m.top.findNode("borderRight").translation = [m.top.width - 1, 0] showfocus() end if end function
function showfocus() if m.top.gridHasFocus and m.top.rowHasFocus focusOn() else focusOff() end if end function
function focusOn() m.backgroundColor.color = "0x222222" m.itemText.color = "0xffffff" end function
function focusOff() m.backgroundColor.color = "0x22222200" m.itemText.color = "0xdddddd" end function
